name: UTS (Unreserved Ticket System)
description:
In this case study, we propose to make daily railway travelers’ lives more comfortable. We're planning to redesign the Unreserved Ticketing System app (UTS on mobile), which thousands of commuters use every day to purchase their railways tickets online.

Indian railways had released the 'Unreserved Mobile Ticketing' (UTS on Mobile) app for purchasing unreserved tickets online. The app now offers unreserved tickets on all sections and across all train zones. The app is compatible with Android, Windows, and iOS devices. The app supports both paperless and paper tickets, as well as online payment. Travelers can now book their journey tickets online.

UTS app enables seamless booking of unreserved tickets all over Indian Railways, wiping out the need for passengers to wait in queues for purchasing the tickets.

This move aims to promote three C’:

•          Cashless transactions (Digital payment)

•          Contact less ticketing (no need to physically visit the point of sale)

•          Customer convenience and experience.
